long_description: Part of the TraiLogic collection, the Kelty SB 20 Sleeping Bag features 800-fill DriDown(TM) insulation that defends against moisture and keeps you warm no matter how quickly the temperature drops. With a European Norm (EN) lower-limit rating of 20degF, the SB 20 is suitable for 3-season backpacking when temperatures drop below freezing. High-quality 800-fill-power DriDown(TM) down insulation fends off moisture to help maintain warmth. Waterproof fabric at the head and feet is positioned to keep you from feeling the effects of condensation on tent walls. A draft tube backs the 60-in. 2-way zipper to keep cold air out; antisnag design keeps the zipper from catching on the fabric. Kelty TraiLogic(TM) SB 20 Sleeping Bag comes with a storage bag and stuff sack. European Norm (EN) is an independent third-party temperature rating, allowing accurate comparisons across brands with other EN-rated bags.
short_description: Part of the TraiLogic collection, the Kelty SB 20 Sleeping Bag features 800-fill DriDown(TM) insulation that defends against moisture and keeps you warm no matter how quickly the temperature drops.
